Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), Cordial Biarritz is minutes from Yumbo Shopping Center and CITA Shopping Center. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Kasbah Shopping Center and Maspalomas Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 76 guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Plasma televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and microwaves, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including outdoor tennis courts, an outdoor pool, and a lazy river. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Cordial Biarritz. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Cordial Biarritz. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), Cordial Biarritz is minutes from Yumbo Shopping Center and CITA Shopping Center. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Kasbah Shopping Center and Maspalomas Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Yumbo Shopping Center - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
CITA Shopping Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Kasbah Shopping Center - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Maspalomas Beach - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Holiday World Maspalomas - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Maspalomas Golf Course - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Maspalomas Dunes - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Las Burras Beach - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Playa de San Agustin - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Maspalomas Lighthouse - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Meloneras Beach - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Aqualand Maspalomas - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
El Aguila Beach - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Palmitos Park - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi
Puerto Rico Marina - 13.6 km / 8.5 mi

The preferred airport for Cordial Biarritz is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 27.1 km / 16.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
